dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Welcome, space travelers. I'm Captain Orion of the Galactic Union. We've received your distress signal and have come to your aid.

dialogues.speaker: Dr. Sophia Patel
dialogues.text: Thank you, Captain. Our ship suffered a catastrophic engine failure. We're lucky to be alive.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We'll do our best to repair your vessel, but in the meantime, we need to discuss the... unusual readings we've detected coming from your cargo hold.

dialogues.speaker: Dr. Sophia Patel
dialogues.text: Unusual readings? What kind of readings?

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We're not entirely sure. Our sensors are picking up some sort of energy signature, but it's unlike anything we've seen before.
